text: Héricourt is a commune located in the Bourgogne-Franche-Comté region in the Haute-Saône department in eastern France. About people live there. On 1 January 2019, Tavey was merged into the commune of Héricourt.Arrêté préfectoral 19 October 2018 == References == Category:Communes in Haute-Saône
title: Héricourt (Haute-Saône)
